tool_description:
CodeROG SEO API: Your Complete SEO Toolkit

Elevate your website's SEO game with our powerful suite of tools:

- Redirect Checker
- WordPress Theme Detector
- Page Size Checker
- Get HTTP Headers
- Open Graph Checker
- Meta Tags Analyzer
- Keyword Rank Checker
- Keyword Density Checker
- Hosting Checker
- Whois Domain Lookup
- Domain to IP
- Domain Age Checker

Stay tuned for more features coming soon to further enhance your SEO efforts. Get comprehensive insights, optimize your site, and sta...
name: SEO API
title: SEO API

Link Analyzer

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seo-api2.p.rapidapi.com/whois-domain-lookup/facebook.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seo-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://seo-api2.p.rapidapi.com/whois-domain-lookup/{domain_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seo-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: pages
optional_parameters.description: How many pages should the search extend

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: API supports more than 80 languages. The default language is English (en).

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: Two-letter country codes that can be used as values of the geo location parameter.

required_parameters.name: record_type
required_parameters.description:
Allowed Record Types: 

- A
- AAAA
- CNAME
- NS
- SOA
- MX
- SRV
- TXT
- CAA
- NAPTR
- PTR
- HINFO
- A6
